website_summaries.verdict: A good handheld air quality monitoring option for more detailed and accurate results.
pros: Multi-spectrum tester uses both laser and electrochemical sensors for accurate testing results
Large colored display is easy to read and use during testing
cons: Requires a lengthy initial calibration process to get the best readings

customer_reviews.title: Seems quite accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I have done some simple testing of PM 2.5 with visibility and other PM measurements. Also by turning my HEPA filter on and off in my rooms, and the meter seems accurate. I have discovered that to turn the monitor off it is really necessary to hold the on/off button down for 3-4 seconds. If this is not done, the monitor will go into a standby mode and continue to drain the battery even though the screen is off.
customer_reviews.author: W. M. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Defective and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a scuffed box with mild abrasions on the device itself that made me wonder if it had been previously returned. The temperature gauge is wildly inaccurate (by up to 20 F), and inconsistently so. Moreover, the screen has several manufacturing defects, and the battery rapidly drains. It’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Almost sent this back - temp, humidity and formaldehyde were way out of specs. Tried recalibration and restarting it. Finally left it on and checked several hours later and reading were now correct. Appears it takes some time for it to get proper readings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I'm afrad of the smell of the new furniture is harmful to my kids so I bought this unit. The number shows on the screen is very close to the test kit I used. It's reusable and can be kept on all the time to monitor the level of harmful air. A must have to know about your indoor air quality.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Good  Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Portable, fast start up. Excellent display. It helped me confirm the air quality where I work. I had concerns about dusts in the air and this helped me measure the levels. I think it has a lot of value for the money. Especially when it comes to safety and health.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ar

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this air quality monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I calibrated this outside, on my deck. Then, I tested my kitchen... Only to find out it had a high VOC’s. I guess this can be common for the kitchen. Now I know I need an air purifier in there. So glad I bought this air quality monitor!
